Articles.Content:
I just wanted to take a moment and thank all of the mod makers. I'm sure right about now you are being inundated with requests for 1.4 updates and I'd bet that can get annoying. Please know that the ones constantly pestering you for updates are the vocal minority. Most of us are perfectly content to patiently wait for your works of art to be ready for primetime. You, the modders, are one of the main things that make this game so special. I have nearly 1800 hours of enjoyment in this game and that is, in large part, thank to you. 

Just wanted to say that
